titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to establish an energy efficiency materials pilot program.
A bill to require the Secretary of Energy to establish an energy efficiency materials pilot program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
This bill requires the Department of Energy to establish a pilot program to award grants for providing nonprofit buildings with energy-efficiency materials.
The bill reduces the authorization of appropriations for the zero net energy commercial buildings initiative for FY2018.
